meanings.sent1: The children would gawk at the colorful parade.
meanings.sent2: People tend to gawk at accidents on the road.
meanings.sent3: She couldn't help but gawk at the dancing dog.
meanings.sent4: The city lights gawked back at the starry sky.
meanings.sent5: The tourists gawked in amazement at the towering skyscrapers.

meanings.definition: A person who stares openly and stupidly
meanings.sent1: The gawk stood out in the crowd with his constant staring.
meanings.sent2: She felt uncomfortable under the gaze of the gawk.
meanings.sent3: The gawk at the zoo made funny faces to entertain the visitors.
meanings.sent4: He was a gawk in the art gallery, mesmerized by the paintings.
meanings.sent5: The gawk's eyes widened in surprise as the magician performed his tricks.
